import axios from 'axios'; import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import {Container,Row,Col,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import AppURL from '../../api/AppURL'; class Categories extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { MenuData: [] } } componentDidMount() { axios.get(AppURL.AllCategoryDetails).then(response => { this.setState({ MenuData: response.data }); }).catch(error => { }); } render() { const CatList =this.state.MenuData; const MyView=CatList.map((CatList,i)=>{ return

 }) return (

 ) } } export default Categories
